about.name: Zurich
about.info_text: Zurich, the largest city in Switzerland, is a vibrant and cosmopolitan destination known for its picturesque old town, world-class museums, and a bustling urban scene. Situated on the shores of Lake Zurich and surrounded by the Swiss Alps, the city offers a perfect blend of nature and culture. Zurich is also a global financial hub and boasts a rich culinary scene with a variety of international and Swiss cuisine. Visitors can explore historic sites, enjoy shopping along the Bahnhofstrasse, and experience the city's thriving arts and nightlife.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 430,000
Canton: Zurich
Time Zone: Central European Time (UTC+01:00)
Official Languages: German
Currency: Swiss Franc (CHF)
about.climate_text: Zurich experiences a temperate maritime climate with four distinct seasons. Summers are mild, and winters are cold with occasional snowfall. The city enjoys a good amount of sunshine throughout the year.

attractions_card.title: Old Town (Altstadt)
attractions_card.description: Zurich's historic Old Town is a charming area with medieval buildings, cobblestone streets, and iconic landmarks like Grossmünster and Fraumünster.

attractions_card.title: Lake Zurich
attractions_card.description: Lake Zurich is a picturesque lake where you can enjoy boat rides, swim, or simply relax by the waterfront while taking in the stunning views.

attractions_card.title: Swiss National Museum
attractions_card.description: The Swiss National Museum houses a diverse collection showcasing Switzerland's cultural history, including art, artifacts, and historical exhibits.

attractions_card.title: Zurich Zoo
attractions_card.description: Zurich Zoo is a family-friendly attraction featuring a wide range of animals from around the world and offering educational experiences.

attractions_card.title: Bahnhofstrasse
attractions_card.description: Bahnhofstrasse is one of the world's most exclusive shopping streets, lined with luxury boutiques, department stores, and cafes.

attractions_card.title: Kunsthaus Zurich
attractions_card.description: Kunsthaus Zurich is a renowned art museum featuring a vast collection of European and Swiss art, including works by famous artists.

attractions_card.title: Uetliberg Mountain
attractions_card.description: Uetliberg Mountain offers hiking trails and panoramic views of Zurich and the Alps, making it a popular destination for outdoor enthusiasts.

attractions_card.title: Swiss Alps Excursions
attractions_card.description: Zurich serves as a gateway to the Swiss Alps, and you can embark on various excursions to explore the stunning mountain landscapes.

food_card.title: Fondue
food_card.description: Fondue is a classic Swiss dish where you dip pieces of bread into melted cheese, often accompanied by wine and traditional condiments.

food_card.title: Zürcher Geschnetzeltes
food_card.description: Zürcher Geschnetzeltes is a Zurich specialty featuring sliced veal in a creamy white wine and mushroom sauce, typically served with Rösti.

food_card.title: Rösti
food_card.description: Rösti is a Swiss potato dish, similar to hash browns, and is often served as a side or breakfast item in Zurich.

food_card.title: Zurich-style Saffron Risotto
food_card.description: Zurich-style Saffron Risotto is a creamy and aromatic dish made with saffron-infused rice, often served with Swiss cheese and white wine.

food_card.title: Swiss Chocolate
food_card.description: Zurich offers a delectable array of Swiss chocolate, and you can explore chocolate shops and indulge in the finest Swiss confections.

hotels_card.title: Baur au Lac
hotels_card.description: Baur au Lac is a luxurious hotel overlooking Lake Zurich, known for its elegance, world-class service, and beautiful gardens.

hotels_card.title: The Dolder Grand
hotels_card.description: The Dolder Grand is a five-star hotel offering a blend of historic charm and modern amenities, along with stunning views of the city and Alps.

hotels_card.title: Storchen Zürich
hotels_card.description: Storchen Zürich is a boutique hotel located in the heart of Zurich's old town, offering a unique and charming stay with views of the river.

hotels_card.title: Hotel Schweizerhof Zurich
hotels_card.description: Hotel Schweizerhof Zurich is a stylish and modern hotel with comfortable accommodations, a restaurant, and a convenient central location.

transport_card.title: Zurich Airport
transport_card.description: Zurich Airport is the largest international airport in Switzerland, providing access to the city for travelers from around the world.

transport_card.title: Zurich Public Transport
transport_card.description: Zurich boasts an efficient public transport system, including trams, buses, and trains, making it easy to get around the city and its surroundings.

transport_card.title: Zurich Main Train Station
transport_card.description: Zurich's main train station, Zurich Hauptbahnhof, is a major transportation hub connecting the city with other Swiss destinations and European cities.

transport_card.title: Taxis in Zurich
transport_card.description: Taxis are readily available in Zurich and provide a convenient way to travel within the city and reach specific locations.

transport_card.title: Bike Rentals
transport_card.description: Zurich promotes cycling, and you can rent bikes to explore the city and its beautiful lakeside and riverside paths.
